archimate:Requirement.name: 4.23.6 Systems Development Access Requirements Control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Business requirements should take into account the need for access: a) by particular types of user (e.g. internal users, IT specialists, technical support specialists, suppliers or customers) b) from particular locations (e.g. home offices or external party premises) c) to particular types of information (e.g. credit card details, PII or trade secrets).
